conversations.question: What are the benefits in pregnancy follow-up?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to free pregnancy follow-up, including choosing a specialist doctor

conversations.question: What is the discount on genetic screening tests?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a 90% discount on genetic screening tests, including genetic counseling

conversations.question: What are the benefits in system scans?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to free system scans, including early and late scans

conversations.question: What are the benefits in childbirth preparation course?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a free childbirth preparation course, including a delivery room tour

conversations.question: How many nutritional counseling sessions am I entitled to?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to 5 free nutritional counseling sessions, including a personalized plan

conversations.question: What is the coverage for pregnancy complications treatment?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to 90% coverage for pregnancy complications treatment, including home hospitalization if needed
